title: Australian Fibreboard Container
brief_description: A film commissioned by the Australian Fibreboard Manufacturers Association and APM to develop and promote cardboard box use. Depicts the logging of eucalypts, log processing, pulping and drying of paper, as well as paper recycling, cardboard processing, different tests for strength and the role of cardboard in packaging.
